 Promotion for top up on 8-9 May, 2014 1. Content and regulations: - Pre-paid subscribers (active, one-way blocked, two-way blocked - still in the maintaining period) receive the following benefits when top-up: MobiQ, Q-Teen, Q-kid subscribers : bonus 50% value (25% added to KM2 credit, 25% added to KM3 credit) MobiCard, Q-Student, Q263 : bonus 49% value (24% added to KM2 credit, 25% added to KM3 credit) Others (excluding PFC subscribers): bonus 38% value (19% added to KM 2 credit, 19% added to KM3 credit) MobiCard subscriber : Bonus 100% days of use from the top-up if the main balance have more than VND0 after loading. PFC: Data1 &#12288; Top up value MobiQ, Q-Teen, Q-kid MobiCard, Q-Student, Q263 Others ( except PFC) PFC MobiCard KM2 KM3 KM2 KM3 KM2 KM3 Data 1 Days of use 5.000 1.250 1.250 1.200 1.250 9 50 9 50 13MB 02 days 10.000 2.500 2.500 2.400 2.500 1.900 1.900 25MB 04 days 20.000 5.000 5.000 4 .800 5.000 3.800 3.800 50MB 08 days 30.000 7.500 7.500 7.200 7.500 5 .700 5 .700 75MB 14 days 50.000 12.500 12.500 12.000 12.500 9 .500 9 .500 125MB 24 days 100.000 25.000 25.000 24.000 25.000 19.000 19.000 250MB 60 days 200.000 50.000 50.000 48 .000 50.000 38.000 38.000 500MB 14 0 days 300.000 75.000 75.000 72.000 75.000 57 .000 57 .000 750MB 230 days 500.000 125.000 125.000 120.000 125.000 95.000 95.000 1,2GB 430 days &#12288; &#12288; - Notice : Unlimited times and value of top-up The bonus accounts are not used for data services Subscribers that are under the promotion for new subscribers: top-up made in this period receives benefits in this promotion and is considered as one top-up in the other promotion 2. 8- 9/5/2014 &#12288; 1. &#6050;&#6033;&#6071;&#6039;&#6070;&#6038; &#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6016;&#6086;&#6030;&#6031;&#6091;&#6102; -​ &#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6036;&#6020;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6040;&#6075;&#6035;&#6016;&#6086;&#6038;&#6075;&#6020;&#6026;&#6086;&#6030;&#6078;&#6042;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;, &#6036;&#6020;&#6098;&#6017;&#6070;&#6086;&#6020; 2. &#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035; : &#6038;&#6072;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 8/5/2014 &#6026;&#6043;&#6091;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 9/5/2014 &#6100;
